original_title: Grindstone Redux: The Story of the 1980s U.S. Underground Music Network
overview: This is the story of how the music business was transformed in the 1980s by like-minded musicians who decided to self-publish their work. They formed a “network” before the internet or email made it commonplace.
title: Grindstone Redux: The Story of the 1980s U.S. Underground Music Network
